episode_summary: This episode features facts from the hosts' new book, 'The Book of the Year 2019', covering topics such as Greta Thunberg's middle name, self-driving cars, unique polling stations in India, and a Canadian man's double ticketing incident.

facts.fact: Greta Thunberg's middle name is Tintin.
You can now be pulled over for drink driving by your own car.
In a country of 1.3 billion people, a polling station was set up in the middle of the jungle for one single man.
A Canadian man who threw his speeding ticket out of his car window was then given a ticket for littering.
